Pokemon.Name: Alakazan
Pokemon.Description: Evolves from Kadabra. Damage Swamp. Type Pokemon Power

Pokemon.Name: Charizard
Pokemon.Description: hp: 120 Evolves from Charmeleon. Energy Burn. Pokemon Power Fire Spin. Cost 4 Fire. 100 Damage

Pokemon.Name: Gyrados
Pokemon.Description: hp: 100 Evolves from Magikarp <3. Dragon Rage. Cost 4 Water. 50 damage. Weakness: Grass (Value 2x) Resistance: Fighting (Value -30)

Pokemon.Name: Clefairy
Pokemon.Description: hp: 40 Evolves to Clefable. Attack: Sing. Cost 1 Colorless. Puts the Defending Pokémon to Sleep on heads. Attack: Metronome. Cost 3 Colorless. Copies one of the Defending Pokémon's attacks. Weakness: Fighting (×2) Resistance: Psychic (-30)

Pokemon.Name: Gyarados
Pokemon.Description: hp: 100 Evolves from Magikarp <3. Attack: Dragon Rage. Cost 3 Water. 50 damage. Attack: Bubblebeam. Cost 4 Water. 40 damage and Paralyze on heads. Weakness: Grass (×2) Resistance: Fighting (-30)

Pokemon.Name: Hitmonchan
Pokemon.Description: hp: 70 Attack: Jab. Cost 1 Fighting. 20 damage. Attack: Special Punch. Cost 2 Fighting and 1 Colorless. 40 damage. Weakness: Psychic (×2)
